definition: to publish/to issue (stocks, currency etc)/to release/to distribute (a film)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
offering memorandum (for public stock issue)/publication memorandum
a bonus issue (a form of dividend payment)

sentences.english: These are usually associated with a major publisher and a strong brand.
sentences.chinese: 他们通过与一个大型的发行商和很强的品牌相关联。

sentences.english: The Distributor is authorized to sub-contract and assign the distribution and sales of the Products to sub-contractors of Fangyuan Group.
sentences.chinese: 发行人已授权转包及销售此产品给方园集团的转包商。

sentences.english: Wenweipao, which I enjoy reading, is published in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 我爱看的文汇报是在香港发行的。

sentences.english: In theory, to issue exchangeable bonds on the market is good.
sentences.chinese: 从理论上讲，在市场上发行可转换债券是好的。

sentences.english: We expect to have this re-added prior to final release.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望在最终发行之前重新加上。

sentences.english: Although issuer gets right gold, need to assume the market to turn over aweather danger however.
sentences.chinese: 发行者虽然收到权利金，却需要承担市场反向风险。

sentences.english: Contemplated share offerings, both initial public offerings and straightforward share issuances , are being put back on the shelf.
sentences.chinese: 首次公开募股等各种预期中的股票发行也已经搁置。

sentences.english: Kelley, a critically acclaimed singer-songwriter, is due to release a new album in February.
sentences.chinese: 作为创作型歌手的凯利将在明年二月发行新唱片。

sentences.english: Does the company have a plan for the IPO?
sentences.chinese: 贵公司对新股发行有何计划？

sentences.english: The central bank issued a commemorative 10-yuan bank note to mark the Beijing Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 央行为纪念北京奥运会将发行10圆面值的纪念钞。

sentences.english: Hong Kong has three Banks issue currency, spend attention see denominations.
sentences.chinese: 香港有三家银行发行货币，花钱注意看清面额。

sentences.english: Installs redistributable merge modules and a set of graphics.
sentences.chinese: 安装可再发行的合并模块和一组图形。

sentences.english: What‘s the total circulation of this journal?
sentences.chinese: 这份期刊的总发行量是多少？

sentences.english: The publisher of the book went further though.
sentences.chinese: 然而，此书的发行人做得更绝。

sentences.english: The post also included contact information with the assistant to the publisher.
sentences.chinese: 文章中还公布了报刊发行助理的联系方式。

sentences.english: Julia keeps up to date with all the latest pop record releases.
sentences.chinese: 朱丽娅收集了最近发行的所有流行音乐的唱片。

definition: to underwrite (i.e. guarantee financing)/underwriting/to sell as agent/consignee
album/record (music)/special collection of printed or broadcast material
to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
to undertake to purchase sth/to subscribe (to share issue)
